curator_overview: Options for RV parks and trailer parking near the showgrounds, with practical details for rigs, hookups, and horse show life.
curator_cta_text: Reserve early if you’re hauling down—spaces with hookups go quickly during peak weeks.

on_site.description: RV spaces or hookups offered directly by the venue.

nearby_short_drive.description: Private or public RV parks within 15 minutes of the venue.

wider_area.description: Options within 30–45 minutes, better for long-term stays or budget-conscious rigs.

pro_tips: Confirm gate code for late-night arrival after shipping horses.
Check clearance on access roads for tall rigs.
